methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Create a new Duration object.

= ERROR CONDITIONS
- If the input frame is not in the allowed list, an error is thrown.

= INPUT VARIABLES
- frame     The frame of the duration.  Must be 'ET' or 'UTC'
- seconds  The number of seconds in the Duration.

methods.name: frame
methods.docstring: Return the frame the duration is in.

methods.name: seconds
methods.docstring: Return the number of seconds in the Duration.

methods.name: checkSameFrame
methods.docstring:
Check to see if frames are the same.

= ERROR CONDITIONS
- If the frame of the rhs Duration is not the same as our frame,
  an error is thrown.

= INPUT VARIABLES
- rhs     The Duration to check for the same frame
- func    The name of the function doing the check.

functions.name: frame
functions.docstring: Return the frame the duration is in.

functions.name: seconds
functions.docstring: Return the number of seconds in the Duration.

functions.name: checkSameFrame
functions.docstring:
Check to see if frames are the same.

= ERROR CONDITIONS
- If the frame of the rhs Duration is not the same as our frame,
  an error is thrown.

= INPUT VARIABLES
- rhs     The Duration to check for the same frame
- func    The name of the function doing the check.
